JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities  Working with modern ES6 JavaScript/Typescript in both client and server (Node/Express) contexts.Write clean code(primarily JS with typescript) with clean reports from static code analysis, prettier configurations, code comments and unit tests.Write end to end automation test cases using tools like cypress.io, detox etc.Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applicationsWrite and consume Restful APIsTest, test, test - to ensure high-quality deliverables.Write a self-documenting code and READMEs to make it easier for the next person to pick up the code.Develop automation scripts using Node or Python to avoid repeating manual tasks.Writing serverless components and pipelinesDesired Candidate Profile  Strong JS knowledge with ES6 and typescript(preferred)Strong experience with either ReactJs, AngularJs or VueJsStrong knowledge of Node JSWorking knowledge of one more language like Java, .net or Python.SQL knowledge for complex queries and performance optimizationsUnderstanding of security aspects like TLS, Encryption, Password hashing etc.Strong communication and collaboration skills.Strong knowledge of computing fundamentals like networking and security.Working knowledge of containers with Docker and Kubernetes(preferably)Working knowledge of one of the Cloud providers like AWS, GCP or AzurePerks and Benefits WFHFlexible TimingsFreshers who can join immediately and have above 60% percent and similar throughout 10th, 12th and graduation
